generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\arguments
generators.summary: Generate an array of arguments for the callable function.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\arrays
generators.summary: Generate an array of mixed values.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\ascii
generators.summary: Generate an ASCII character.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\booleans
generators.summary: Generate a boolean value.

arguments.description: the minimum character to be generated
arguments.name: minChar

arguments.description: the maximum character to be generated
arguments.name: maxChar

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\characters
generators.summary: Generate a character. The value is generated from all Unicode characters except control characters, surrogates and private ranges.

arguments.description: The minimum element to generate. Can be an integer, float or a one character string. If it's an array, it must be a [min, max] pair.
arguments.name: min

arguments.description: The maximum element to generate. Can be an integer, float or a one character string.
arguments.name: max

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\choose
generators.summary: Generates a random element in the given inclusive range.

arguments.description: The type to be generated. Can be one of: float, int, string.
arguments.name: type

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\chooseAny
generators.summary: Generate a value by type.

arguments.description: The minimum date to be generated. If it's an array, it must be a [min, max] pair.
arguments.name: min

arguments.description: the maximum date to be generated
arguments.name: max

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\dates
generators.summary: Generate dates.

arguments.description: The minimum datetime to be generated. If it's an array, it must a [min, max] pair.
arguments.name: min

arguments.description: the maximum datetime to be generated
arguments.name: max

arguments.description: Optional timezones generator. Default is naive datetimes.
arguments.name: timezones

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\datetimes
generators.summary: Generate datetimes, optionally with generated timezones.

arguments.description: the array to be generated from
arguments.name: array

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\elements
generators.summary: Generates one of the given values. The input list must be non-empty.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\faker
generators.summary: Generates a value from the Faker factory.

arguments.description: the minimum float value to generate
arguments.name: min

arguments.description: the maximum float value to generate
arguments.name: max

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\floats
generators.summary: Generate floats optionally within a specific range.

arguments.description: a weighted list consisting of pairs of [weight, generator]
arguments.name: frequencies

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\frequency
generators.summary: Chooses one of the given generators, with a weighted random distribution. The input list must be non-empty.

arguments.description: the array containing the elements to be selected
arguments.name: array

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\growingElements
generators.summary: Takes a list of elements of increasing size, and chooses among an initial segment of the list. The size of this initial segment increases with the size parameter. The input list must be non-empty.

arguments.description: an array of intervals to include in selecting the value
arguments.name: include

arguments.description: an array of intervals to exclude from the selection
arguments.name: exclude

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\intervals
generators.description: Intervals are defined as a list of [min, max] pairs, for example: [[1, 3], [4, 10], [11, 40]].
generators.summary: Generate an element within a set of intervals, and excluding another set of intervals.

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\listOf
generators.summary: Generates a list of random length. The maximum length depends on the size parameter.

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\listOf1
generators.summary: Generates a non-empty list of random length. The maximum length depends on the size parameter.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\mixed
generators.summary:
Randomly generates from one of the following generators:

  • strings()
  • choose()
  • booleans()
  • dates()
  • datetimes()
  • listOf(strings())
  • listOf(choose())

arguments.description: the list of generators to be chosen from
arguments.name: gens

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\oneof
generators.summary: Randomly uses one of the given generators. The input list must be non-empty.

arguments.description: the size to be used by the generator
arguments.name: n

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\resize
generators.summary: Overrides the size parameter. Returns a generator which uses the given size instead of the runtime-size parameter.

arguments.description: the transform function that scales the size
arguments.name: f

arguments.description: the generator who's size will be scaled
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\scale
generators.summary: Adjust the size parameter, by transforming it with the given function.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\strings
generators.summary: Generate strings, optionally from a specific character generator.

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

arguments.description: the predicate function that must be satisfied
arguments.name: f

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\suchThat
generators.summary: Generates a value that satisfies a predicate.

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

arguments.description: the map function
arguments.name: f

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\suchThatMap
generators.description: The callable must return a Maybe object.
generators.summary: Generates a value for which the given function returns a Just, and then applies the function.

arguments.description: the generator that creates the values
arguments.name: gen

arguments.description: the predicate function that must be satisfied
arguments.name: f

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\suchThatMaybe
generators.summary: Tries to generate a value that satisfies a predicate. If it fails to do so after enough attempts, returns Nothing.

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\timezones
generators.summary: Generate a timezone.

arguments.description: the seed to be used by the generator
arguments.name: seed

arguments.description: the generator to be seeded
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\variant
generators.summary: Modifies a generator using an integer seed so it will always produce the same result.

arguments.description: the length of the list to be generated
arguments.name: n

arguments.description: the generator that produces the values
arguments.name: gen

generators.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\vectorOf
generators.summary: Generates a list of the given length.

helpers.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\generate

arguments.description: a callable function that returns a value, should accept (Random $r = null, int $n = null), and should pass $r into any generate calls within its body
arguments.name: f

helpers.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\makeGen
helpers.summary: Make a generator from a callable function.

arguments.description: The property function (or check).
arguments.name: f

arguments.description: Stream for the quickCheck output. Defaults to stdout.
arguments.name: output

helpers.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\quickCheck
helpers.description: A property function (or check) must return a boolean result.
helpers.output:

helpers.summary: Checks that a so-called property function (or check) holds true for all arguments given.

helpers.name: Datashaman\PHPCheck\sample
helpers.summary: Generates some example values in increasingly random size.
